Hey guys! Me and Ryan have been working hard to find ways to stand out and provide you with a unique service. As we approach the holidays, I want to share with you what we've done so far to provide you with a unique service.

New features:
1. VirtPanel - We are tired of the "same old thing" and we know you are too. This is step one.
2. DNS Hosting - Each VPS comes with free DNS hosting for one domain, can be set in VirtPanel! (ns1-ns4.catalysthost.com)
3. User Backups - Create and restore your own backup of your VPS! This is being rolled out to current users, automatically set for new ones.
4. Backup Policy - Catalyst is responsible for backing up your data weekly. You heard me right. We are responsible for keeping your data safe. I fully understand the burden I am taking on. I welcome this.

Our goal for 2013:
We want to add 10 features that are either unheard of or uncommon in the low end VPS market.

With that said, here's our December special! We are offering 50% off your first month of service (PROMOCODE: 50%FirstMonth). We are also offering a 25% recurring discount for a limited number of signups (Code: 25%Recurring). Give us a chance to earn your business. You won't regret it.
